data.text:
Our Barcelona top features a bandeau style with adjustable, thin shoulder strap and offers the ultimate support for your bust. The top has a nice smocked fabric to give it an exclusive look and feel. It can be combined with our Palermo bottom.

Details

Bandeau style

Easy fit with the best support for your bust

Smocked fabric

Adjustable, thin shoulder straps

Double-lined for ultimate support

Seamless stitching

Soft, sustainable ECONYL® fabric

78% Recycled Polyamide / 22% Elastane

Resistant to suntan creams and oils

Designed in Amsterdam, handmade with love in Bali

From the ocean, for the ocean

Our collection of swimwear is made from recycled ocean plastics such as discarded fishing nets recovered from the ocean. All of our pieces are made using ECONYL yarn, which is a 100% regenerated nylon yarn obtained from pre- and post-consumer nylon waste. We are able to turn waste problems into solutions and the result is our collection of premium quality swimwear.

How to take care

After use - especially if used in chlorine pools & spas, rinse and soak in cool clear water. If washing is needed, hand wash in mild detergent. This makes your piece last longer and it is better for the environment as well. Dry flat in shade and do not bleach, nor tumble dry or iron. Avoid contact with chlorine, suntan lotions and rough surfaces as much as possible.

Find your size

(Studio) model 1 (with tattoos) is 164 cm tall, bust 80 cm, under bust 70 cm, hips 92 cm and is wearing NILA size S.

(Studio) model 2 is 168cm tall, bust 85 cm, under bust 74 cm, hips 94 cm and is wearing NILA size M.

Use our size chart below for advice on sizes. If you are unsure or need help, just reach out to us by emailing to hi@nilathelabel.com or send a DM on Instagram.
